vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀμφίπολις,
poetry ἀμφίπτολις, ὁ, ἡ, encompassing city, ἀνάγκη ἀμφίπτολις[Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II substantive ἀ., ἡ, city encompassed by a river, as proper name, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: Amphipolis, "a city surrounded" or "a city conspicuous"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Amphipolis, "a city surrounded" or "a city conspicuous"
Amphipolis, a city of Thrace, on the river Strymon, Acts 17:1*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
暗妃波里 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "被河圍繞的城市"
馬基頓 Prima 的城市之一, 因Strymon河圍繞而得名(徒 17:1)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
暗妃波里 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "被河围绕的城市"
马基顿 Prima 的城市之一, 因Strymon河围绕而得名(徒 17:1)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Am-phi-bô-lít hoặc Am-phi-pô-li: một thành của Thrace.
